page.title: 17FAMILY WEEKEND IN DERBYSHIRE
page.content: THIS YEAR A WEEKEND VISIT TO THE DOVEDALE AREA WAS AGAIN ORGANISED WITH THE HELP OF PARENTS WHO ACCOMPANY THE GROUP AND OTHERS WHO PROVIDE TRANSPORT TO THE ASHBOURNE END OF THE TISSINGTON TRAIL.CHILDREN/STUDENTS WHO HAVE LEFT THE SCHOOL ALSO JOIN US.MR PRICE HAS BEEN TAKING PARTIES FOR 17 YEARS.WENDY WHO HOPES TO GO TO A POLYTECHNIC IN OCTOBER AND IS 18 CAME AGAIN.WE WALK ALONG THE TRAIL TO THORPE, STOPPING FOR A PICNIC AND A DRINK AT THE "DOG AND PARTRIDGE" BEFORE WALKING UP THE GATED ROAD AND FOLLOWING FOOTPATHS TO LOVERS LEAP IN DOVEDALE. WE WALK TO THE STEPPING STONES WHERE WE SOAK OUR WEARY FEET. SOMETIMES WE CLIMB THORPE CLOUD. THE YOUTH HOSTEL IS VERY POPULAR BECAUSE THERE ARE SO MANY PLACES TO PLAY INDOORS AND OUT. WE WALKED THROUGH HALL DALE TO MILLDALE ON SUNDAY. IT COST ONLY Â£6.10.
